arts.ttl: Real Madrid’s Kylian Mbappé Called Liar Over Ethan Mbappé, PSG Claim
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé’s highly anticipated free transfer to Real Madrid this summer hasn’t gone as smoothly as expected. However, the player revealed he was willing to put his dream move on hold for one important reason. In an interview with Clique, Mbappé shared that he would have stayed at Paris Saint-Germain for his younger brother, Ethan. arts.ttl: Crystal Palace Poised to Rival PSG, West Ham for £29M-Rated Standout
arts.sum: In November, Olympique Lyonnais faced a hefty financial penalty from the DNCG (Direction Nationale du Contrôle de Gestion), putting the club under significant financial strain. Even so, a fire sale during the January transfer window isn’t guaranteed. arts.ttl: Liverpool Set to Trigger £37.3M Release Clause for Man Utd, PSG Transfer Target
arts.sum: In October, a report surfaced that Paris Saint-Germain have identified River Plate’s Franco Mastantuono as their top transfer target, with plans to activate his €40 million release clause. However, this fee could increase to €45 million in the final ten days of a transfer window. While PSG are keen, Diario AS journalist Eduardo Burgos highlighted […] The post Liverpool Set to Trigger £37.3M Release Clause for Man Utd, PSG Transfer Target appeared first on PSG Talk.

arts.ttl: Luis Enrique says PSG 'can still be out' of UCL
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain boss Luis Enrique praised his side after their 3-0 win at RB Salzburg in the Champions League on Tuesday, but said they must improve if they want to stay in the competition.

arts.ttl: Man Utd Set to Make Key Decision on Replacing Dan Ashworth Amid PSG Chief Rumors
arts.sum: Manchester United are reportedly considering three candidates for the sporting director role. However, Sir Jim Ratcliffe is in no rush to make a decision following the unexpected departure of Dan Ashworth. As a result, it might explain the latest news on replacing Ashworth. arts.sum: With Ruben Amorim now in charge, Marcus Rashford’s future at Manchester United could begin to take shape during the 2024-25 season. arts.ttl: Video: Désiré Doué Scores Impressive First PSG Goal Against Salzburg
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain needed a win over RB Salzburg to stay in contention for a spot in the next round of the UEFA Champions League. arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | RB Salzburg 0-3 PSG: Dominance in possession leads to victory as Les Parisiens end stuttering European run
arts.sum: UEFA Champions League, Matchday 6, 10/12/2024 After a four-match winless run in Europe, Paris Saint-Germain finally turned the domination of possession into victory with a 3-0 win against RB Salzburg…
